channel.title: CVE Feed for MW6 Tech -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MW6 Tech -- all products

item.title: CVE-2013-6040|2024-09-05T14:25:52.484Z -- mw6%20tech -- mw6%20aztec%20activex%20controls
item.description: MW6 Aztec, DataMatrix, and MaxiCode ActiveX controls before version 4.0 vulnerable to arbitrary code via a crafted HTML document. Latest versions (4.0) of MW6 Aztec, DataMatrix, and MaxiCode ActiveX controls have resolved the issue
